This is the second time I've ordered this, and - as ridiculous as this will sound - I'm still not sure I like it. I love coffee flavours and haven't seen many on Huff & Puffers, so I had to get this. It is strong brewed coffee, little to no milk, and not sweet. It's nice when you are drinking very sweet coffee to vape this. Or, I'll alternate this with a chocolate vape so there's still that hint of chocolate there. Vaping it in between eating chocolate is very good too. Also, for me at least, it's good, mellow, before bed vape, instead of perky citrus or very sweet vapes.
